boardgame.name: Maori
boardgame.description: The players explore the islands of Polynesia. The winner is the player who scores the most points from putting tiles on his display. Palms, huts, shells, and boats on the tiles influence the scoring. It can be played with 2 to 5 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Game Pit: Episode 46 - Council Chamber: Big Episode on Small Games

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. MAORI: $26.22 USD Rio Grande Games Availability:DIRECT ORDER - In stock at supplier. We will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click onthe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Rio Grande Games (RIO 389) Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 8++ Length: 30-45 minutes Game Description: MAORI: at first, all we see is an endless sea. But wait, there!!! Land in site! Its an island. An isle with sumptuous palm trees. We must visit this island. There, we can trade what we have for the natives’ shells. With shells, we can explore more successfully to gain the islands we seek. In MAORI, the players try to discover their own island worlds. On the islands they find, they can acquire palms and huts of their own. And there is more: boats increase the rate of discovery and shells provide additional options in this simple, yet sophisticated game. Author: Günter Burkhardt

Bought new, played never, put away. In shrinkwrap, never opened. ENG edition. Can provide photos of my copy on request. Can ship in the UK quickly, other places will need research (new at this). Happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR. If you make the Paypal payment as a cash gift to me, I am not charged a fee as you receive no protection in a dispute. If you make the Paypal payment as a commercial transaction, I get charged 3.4% + 20p of the payment because you get protection in a dispute. Previously I was asking buyers to pay the fee but now I realise there is no option to do this (there was years ago). And if you add something to the payment to cover the fee, they get a slice of that. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your choice. If you want the Paypal protection, please go ahead and select the commercial button. If you want to add 1% or 2% to the payment, that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s nice and I thank you.
